## Goal

Scrape the academic calendars on Macalester's Registrar Academic Calendars page and place them into a data frame

## Step 1: Check for API

There is no known API to get the academic calendars

## Step 2: Ethics

The instruction in https://www.macalester.edu/robots.txt (shown below) does not restriction scraping the Registrar Academic Calendars page.
```html
User-agent: *
Disallow: /wp-admin/
Allow: /wp-admin/admin-ajax.php
Disallow: /160-*
Disallow: /*/outreach/
Disallow: /brian-rosenberg/
Disallow: /ga-test/
Disallow: /wordpress-sandbox/
Disallow: /drc-sandbox/

Sitemap: https://www.macalester.edu/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.macalester.edu/sitemap.rss
```

## Step 3: Get Content

```{r}
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://www.macalester.edu/registrar/academic-calendars/"
```

```{r}
page <- read_html(url)
page
```

```{r}
interior_components <- page |> 
  html_elements(".layout-interior__components")
interior_components
```

Semesters
```{r}
semester_labels <- interior_components |> 
  html_elements("h3, h4")
semester_labels
```

```{r}
semester_labels |> 
  html_text()
```


Tables
```{r}
semester_scheddules <- interior_components |> 
  html_elements("table")
semester_scheddules
```

```{r}
semester_scheddules |> 
  html_table()
```
